name: The McCarthy Companies
description:
Founded in the kitchen of his small East Dallas house in January of 1995, Tim McCarthy began The McCarthy Companies cold calling automobile dealers for their advertising business.His methodical, aggressive approach landed the first account within a week. He maintains a consultant relationship with that client to this day. The McCarthy Company continues to set the standard in automotive advertising.
We are known nationwide as the top advertising company in its specialty, breaking sales records in every market we enter. Our clients hold top positions within their market and on a national level.
